abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile talks about
            accelerating economic reforms and mitigating the impact of
            the global economic crisis in Nigeria. With the financial
            crisis, the drop in oil prices and consequently in
            government revenues, the Nigerian economy started
            experiencing tremendous pressure. Economic Reform and
            Governance Project helped the government arrest the slide in
            market confidence, support economic reforms, and address key
            financial transparency issues that will buffer the country
            from future shocks. The project provided budgetary support
            to the Nigerian government to offset the fiscal impact of
            the global financial crisis and also supported the
            government in maintaining its economic reform path in the
            financial sector, fiscal policy, management and governance.
            The improvements in public financial management let everyone
            benefit from improved transparency and better use of public resources.
